page.title: 07Housing 2; Upton Snodsbury.
page.content: Broughton Hackett has a mixture of old and new houses and includes a modern development at Manor Farm, which incorporates the conversion of old oast houses and farm buildings into present day homes..Whiteladies Aston is an exceptionally beautiful willage with many thatched houses now in private ownership. Churchill is a picturesque hamlet of old houses with a small number of attractive modern bungalows. All this area has traditionally been the property of some of the great land owning families, the Berkeleys, Coventrys and Lyttletons, which may explain why there are only a comparatively few modern housing sites. Further building is not envisaged at present.
